Package hac.ex4.controllers

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.controllers.AdminController
@Controller public class AdminController extends Object
Controller that handle all admin pages

    • addNewBook

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/addnewbookform") public String addNewBook(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Return form add book page with default book in the input fields.
      Parameters:
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Add book form page.

    • addBookGET

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/addbook") public String addBookGET(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Implementation of GET request (see the POST that correspond).
      Parameters:
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main admin page.

    • addBookPOST

      @PostMapping("/addbook") public String addBookPOST(@Valid @Valid Book book, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST request with a book from a form and validate the book, if has constraints error, return the same page form with the error messages, if is valid book - save the book in the database.
      Parameters:
      book - - The book to add.
      result - - The result of the constraints.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main admin page (no error) or Add book form page (error).

    • editBookGET

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/edit/{id}") public String editBookGET(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Implementation of GET request (see the POST that correspond).
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to edit.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Update form page.

    • editBookPOST

      @PostMapping("/edit/{id}") public String editBookPOST(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST request with id and return the update form page.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to edit.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Update form page.

    • updateUserGET

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/update/{id}") public String updateUserGET(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Implementation of GET request (see the POST that correspond).
      Parameters:
      id - - id of the book.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main admin page.

    • updateUserPOST

      @PostMapping("/update/{id}") public String updateUserPOST(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Valid @Valid Book book, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST request from the form of update book, with the id and the book to validate, then if the input is valid then update the book which has this id, else if has error return the form with the error messages.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book.
      book - - The new updated book.
      result - - The result of the constraints.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main admin page (no error) or Update form page (error).

    • deleteBookGET

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteBookGET(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Implementation of GET request (see the POST that correspond).
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to delete.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main admin page.

    • deleteBookPOST

      @PostMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteBookPOST(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST request to delete a book.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to delete.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main admin page.
